label: A3B4_hR7_166_ac_2c-001
title: In$_{3}$Se$_{4}$ Structure
comments:
(Geller, 1965) created this structure under pressures of about 35 kBar, but works such as (Villars, 2018) list it as the room temperature structure for In$_{3}$Te$_{4}$. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B4_hR7_166_ac_2c-001}{In$_{3}$Te$_{4}$} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B4_hR7_166_ac_2c-002}{Sn$_{4}$P$_{3}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, A3B4\_hR7\_166\_ac\_2c. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
